issue.title: [CF 897] Sort by cooldown remaining, move shown icons when another is hidden
issue.body:
Hello, i'd like to make a suggestion for a new feature for TellMeWhen.

For example i have a horizontal group that has 6 icons, i would like TMW to automatically sort the icons by remaining cooldown. What i mean is to put the icon with the lowest remaining cooldown all the way to the right and the one with the longest cooldown remaining on the left side.

Another suggestion (that is sort of related) is to move icons that are shown to fill spots that are hidden. Example, i have this group in config mode:
``` [A] [B] [C] [D] [E] [F] ```

Now, for example, only A, C and F are currently shown, right now this would look like this:
``` [A] [C] [F] ```

But i want TMW to move and allign those icons to the right so it looks like this:
``` [A] [C] [F] ```

If there would be a cool 'slide' animation for when icons are automatically moved by TMW that would be very awesome but not necessary
> Posted by CurseForge user Comboqt | Imported from CurseForge issue #897 | Raw

comments.body:
All of these things, with the exception of animations, are already possible in TellMeWhen. Animations when moving an icon will probably never happen.

Check out the Layout Direction and Icon Sorting group options.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
